attributes.action: Change the law to oblige those receiving taxpayer pounds to place their income tax accounts into the public domain.
attributes.additional_details: There's an awful lot of people on the local and national taxpayer payroll picking up an awful lot of money and we, the taxpayer, are being denied access to information regarding how these people are syphoning off more through special deals with HMRC more than any of us herebefore believed.  It is our money, we have a right to know that it is being disbursed and received properly.   The President of the US has to put his tax accounts into the public domain, why should the Mayor of Hartlepool, for example, not have to do the same thing?
